org.jetel.connection.jdbc

Class AbstractDBConnection

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.jetel.graph.GraphElement
      • org.jetel.connection.jdbc.AbstractDBConnection
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IConnection, DBConnection, IGraphElement
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    DBConnectionImpl

    public abstract class AbstractDBConnection
extends GraphElement
implements DBConnection
    Ad hoc base class with metadata generation logic.

        public void closeConnection(java.lang.String elementId)
        Description copied from interface: DBConnection

      • createMetadata

        public DataRecordMetadata createMetadata(java.util.Properties parameters)
                                  throws java.sql.SQLException
        Description copied from interface: IConnection
        Creates clover metadata from this connection. Used by DataRecordMetadataStub for definition metadata from connection. For example - in JDBC connection is expected parameter sqlQuery for definition metadata.
        Specified by:
        createMetadata in interface IConnection
        Returns:
        Throws:
        java.sql.SQLException - if creating metadata fails on SQL querying
